short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides an efficient way to check whether a number is enabled for WA.
short.he,sw: Provides an efficient way to check whether a number is enabled for WA Effectively.
short.hi: Thok mein check karein ki WA ke liye number saksham hain ya nahin.
short.ja: WAで番号が有効になっているかどうかを確認する効率的な方法を提供します。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Oferece uma maneira eficiente de verificar se um número está habilitado para o WA.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 提供一种有效的方法来批量检查电话号码是否在 WhatsApp生效。

long.am,ar,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_US,et,f:
What is WA Number Checker?
Are you spending too much time checking and verifying the phone numbers of list is valid on WhatsApp? If so, WA Number Checker is one of your best choices. 
WA Number Checker is a Chrome extension that provides an efficient way to check whether a phone number is enabled for WhatsApp. And it is designed to streamline the process of checking WhatsApp numbers in bulk.

Who is the Whatsapp Number Checker designed for?
As far as we know, WhatsApp is widely used for business communication. So we developed this WhatsApp number checker to make it easier for e-com sellers and other to better use WhatsApp for marketing and sales. 

What can Whatsapp Number Checker do for you?
Whether your business is on Shopify, Shopee, Lazada, Amazon, or MercadoLibre, WA Number Checker can be of great help to you as long as you use WhatsApp as a marketing tool to connect with customers.
The WhatsApp number checker empowers users to efficiently check, verify WhatsApp numbers validity in a swift and automated manner. Gone are the days of tedious manual verifications; The Chrome extension automates the process, ensuring accuracy and saving you valuable time. Experience the efficiency and precision of the extension – your go-to solution for bulk WhatsApp number verification and filtration. Simplifying the way you validate and filter WhatsApp numbers.

Feature:  
✅ Swift validation of extensive lists of numbers 
✅ Comprehensive recording of all verification progress in the history 
✅ Download lists indicating existing and non-existing numbers in XLSX format 
✅ Exclusive access to the phone number generator tool 
✅ Continuous, complimentary updates

How to utilize this extension for business growth? 
WA Number Checker can be used to verify whether a new customer's mobile number is valid on WhatsApp. You can import the filtered phone number list into the WhatsApp bulk sender to launch in-depth marketing campaigns to these customers, or import it into a CRM tool for customer management.

What is WhatsApp?
WhatsApp (also called WA, Watshap, Wastup, etc.) is a mobile application that provides instant messaging services. It allows users to send text messages, voice messages, pictures, videos, and real-time location information to other users who also use WhatsApp. 

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for it.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.

————————————————————
LEGAL
————————————————————

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.

long.hi:
WA - Bulk WhatsApp Number Checker kya hai?
Kya aap adhik samay bita rahe hain jaanch karte hue aur satyapit karte hue ki soochi mein diye gaye phone number WhatsApp ke liye valid hain ya nahi? Aisa hai to, WA - Bulk WhatsApp Number Checker aapke sabse acche vikalpon mein se ek hai. 
WA - Bulk WhatsApp Number Checker ek Chrome extension hai jo ek daksh tareeke se pradan karta hai ki kya ek phone number WhatsApp ke liye saksham hai. Aur yeh WhatsApp numbers ki badi matra mein jaanch karne ki prakriya ko sankhyagat banane ke liye design kiya gaya hai.
WhatsApp number checker kiske liye design kiya gaya hai? 
Jahan tak hum jaante hain, vyavsayik sanchar ke liye WhatsApp vyapak roop se upayog hota hai. Isliye humne is WhatsApp number checker ko viksit kiya hai taki e-commerce sellers aur anya log WhatsApp ka behtar upayog kar sakein marketing aur bikri ke liye.
WhatsApp number checker aapke liye kya kar sakta hai?
Aapke vyavsayik model ke bawajood, jab tak aap WhatsApp ka upayog grahakon se sambandh sthapit karne ke liye karte hain, yeh WhatsApp number checker upayogkartaon ko dakshata se aur svatantrata se WhatsApp numbers ki pramanikta ki jaanch karne ki sambhavna aur svachalit tareeke se sashakt karta hai. Ubaare gaye hain ubaare ja rahe dino ki kathin manual verification; Chrome extension prakriya ko svatantrikaran karta hai, satikta sunishchit karta hai, aur aapko kimti samay bachata hai. Extension ki kushalta aur satikta ka anubhav karein - aapke liye bulk WhatsApp number verification aur filtration ka ek samadhan. WhatsApp numberon ki pramanikta aur chhanbeen ke liye. WhatsApp numberon ki pramanikta aur chhanbeen ke liye. Saral bana dene wali takneek.
Visheshata: 
✅ Badi soochiyon ki sheeghra manyata ki jaanch 
✅ Itihas mein sabhi satyapan pragati ka vyapak recording 
✅ XLSX praroop mein moujood aur naumoujood numbers ki soochiyon ko download karein 
✅ Phone number generator tool ke liye vishisht upayog 
✅ Nirantar, muft updates
Is extension ko vyavsayik vikas ke liye kaise upayog karein? 
WA - Bulk WhatsApp Number Checker ka upayog iske liye kiya ja sakta hai ki kya naye grahak ka mobile number WhatsApp par valid hai ya nahi. Aap filter kiye gaye phone number soochi ko WhatsApp bulk sender mein import kar sakte hain taki aap in grahakon ke saath gahre marketing abhiyanon ko shuru kar sakein, ya ise ek CRM tool mein import karke grahak prabandhan ke liye upayog kar sakte hain. 
WhatsApp kya hai? 
WhatsApp (jise WA, Watshap, Wastup, aadi kaha jata hai) ek mobile application hai jo turant sandesh seva pradan karta hai. Iske upayogkartaon ko text messages, voice messages, pictures, videos, aur real-time location information bhejne ki anumati hai jo bhi WhatsApp ka upayog karte hain.

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for it.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.

————————————————————
LEGAL
————————————————————

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
long.ja:
WA電話番号認証とは何ですか?
WhatsApp でリストの電話番号が有効であるかどうかを確認するのに時間を費やしすぎていませんか? そうであれば、WA電話番号認証 が最良の選択肢の 1 つです。
  v は、電話番号が WhatsApp で有効になっているかどうかを確認する効率的な方法を提供する Chrome 拡張機能です。 また、WhatsApp の番号を一括で確認するプロセスを合理化するように設計されています。

WhatsApp™ Number Checker は誰を対象に設計されていますか?
私たちが知る限り、WhatsApp はビジネスコミュニケーションに広く使用されています。 そこで私たちは、e-com 販売者などがマーケティングや販売に WhatsApp をより効果的に活用しやすくするために、この WhatsApp 番号チェッカーを開発しました。

Whatsapp 番号チェッカーは何ができますか?
あなたのビジネスが Shopify、Shopee、Lazada、Amazon、または MercadoLibre に掲載されているかどうかに関係なく、顧客とつながるためのマーケティング ツールとして WhatsApp を使用している限り、WA電話番号認証は非常に役立ちます。
WhatsApp 番号チェッカーを使用すると、ユーザーは WhatsApp 番号の有効性を迅速かつ自動化された方法で効率的にチェック、検証できます。 面倒な手動検証の時代は終わりました。 Chrome 拡張機能はプロセスを自動化し、正確性を確保し、貴重な時間を節約します。 拡張機能の効率と精度を体験してください。WhatsApp 番号の一括検証とフィルタリングに最適なソリューションです。 WhatsApp 番号の検証とフィルタリングの方法を簡素化します。

特徴：
✅ 広範な番号リストの迅速な検証
✅ すべての検証の進行状況を履歴に包括的に記録
✅ 既存の番号と存在しない番号を示すリストを XLSX 形式でダウンロード
✅ 電話番号生成ツールへの排他的アクセス
✅ 継続的な無料アップデート

この拡張機能をビジネスの成長にどのように活用すればよいでしょうか?
WA電話番号認証 を使用すると、新規顧客の携帯番号が WhatsApp で有効かどうかを確認できます。 フィルタリングされた電話番号リストを WhatsApp 一括送信者にインポートして、これらの顧客に対して徹底的なマーケティング キャンペーンを開始したり、顧客管理のために CRM ツールにインポートしたりできます。

WhatsAppとは何ですか?
WhatsApp (WA、Watshap、Wastup などとも呼ばれる) は、インスタント メッセージング サービスを提供するモバイル アプリケーションです。 ユーザーは、同じく WhatsApp を使用している他のユーザーにテキスト メッセージ、音声メッセージ、写真、ビデオ、リアルタイムの位置情報を送信できます。

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for it.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.

————————————————————
LEGAL
————————————————————

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
long.pt_BR:
O que é o Verificador de Números do WA?
Como saber se o numero tem whatsapp? O Verificador de Números do WA é uma das suas melhores escolhas.
O Verificador de Números do WA é uma extensão do Chrome que oferece uma maneira eficiente de verificar se um número de telefone está habilitado para o WhatsApp. E foi projetado para simplificar o processo de verificação em massa de números do WhatsApp.

Para quem é destinado o Verificador de Números do Whatsapp?
Até onde sabemos, o WhatsApp é amplamente utilizado para comunicação empresarial. Por isso, desenvolvemos este verificador de números do WhatsApp para facilitar a vida de vendedores de comércio eletrônico e outros a utilizarem melhor o WhatsApp para marketing e vendas.

O que o Verificador de Números do Whatsapp pode fazer por você?
Esteja o seu negócio na Shopify, Shopee, Lazada, Amazon ou MercadoLibre, o Verificador de Números do WA pode ser de grande ajuda para você, desde que você utilize o WhatsApp como ferramenta de marketing para se conectar com clientes.
O verificador de números do WhatsApp capacita os usuários a verificar eficientemente a validade dos números do WhatsApp de maneira rápida e automatizada. Os dias de verificações manuais tediosas acabaram; a extensão do Chrome automatiza o processo, garantindo precisão e economizando seu valioso tempo. Experimente a eficiência e precisão da extensão - sua solução para verificação em massa e filtragem de números do WhatsApp. Simplificando a forma como você valida e filtra números do WhatsApp.

Recursos:
✅ Validação rápida de extensas listas de números
✅ Registro abrangente de todo o progresso de verificação no histórico
✅ Download de listas indicando números existentes e não existentes no formato XLSX
✅ Acesso exclusivo à ferramenta de geração de números de telefone
✅ Atualizações contínuas e gratuitas

Como utilizar esta extensão para o crescimento empresarial?
O Verificador de Números do WA pode ser usado para verificar se o número de celular de um novo cliente é válido no WhatsApp. Você pode importar a lista de números filtrados para o remetente em massa do WhatsApp para lançar campanhas de marketing aprofundadas para esses clientes ou importá-la para uma ferramenta de CRM para gestão de clientes.

O que é o WhatsApp?
O WhatsApp (também chamado de WA, Watshap, Wastup, etc.) é um aplicativo móvel que fornece serviços de mensagens instantâneas. Ele permite que os usuários enviem mensagens de texto, mensagens de voz, imagens, vídeos e informações de localização em tempo real para outros usuários que também usam o WhatsApp.

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for it.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.

————————————————————
LEGAL
————————————————————

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.

long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
您是否在检查和验证 WhatsApp 上列表中的电话号码是否有效上花费了太多时间？ 如果是这样，WA电话号码验证器是您最好的选择之一。 别再犹豫了 – WA电话号码验证器，这是一款革命性的工具，旨在简化批量检查 WhatsApp 号码的过程。
WA电话号码验证器是您一直在等待的 WA 号码检查器，它使用户能够以快速、自动化的方式有效地检查、验证 WhatsApp 号码的有效性。 繁琐的手动验证的日子已经一去不复返了； 该Chrome 扩展程序可自动执行该过程，确保准确性并节省您宝贵的时间。
体验效率和精确度 - 批量 WhatsApp 号码验证和过滤的首选解决方案。 借助 WA电话号码验证器的尖端技术保持领先，简化您验证和过滤 WhatsApp 号码的方式。 立即安装 WA电话号码验证器并提升您的查号体验！

功能特点：
✅ 每次会话可验证多个电话号码；
✅ 快速验证大量数字列表；
✅ 全面记录历史验证结果；
✅ 下载 XLSX 格式的指示WhatsApp中现有和不存在号码的列表
✅ 包含电话号码生成器工具
✅ 持续、免费更新

Disclaimer:
This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified WhatsApp Inc.
This is an unofficial enhancement tool for it.
This software is not to be used against policies of WhatsApp Inc in any manner.
